text: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَهُمْ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And if you asked them who created them, they would surely say, "Allah." So how are they deluded?
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sungguh jika kamu bertanya kepada mereka: "Siapakah yang menciptakan mereka, niscaya mereka menjawab: "Allah", maka bagaimanakah mereka dapat dipalingkan (dari menyembah Allah)?,
